actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that the first sale of crude oil produced from stripper wells be exempt from price controls.

summary.text: Amends the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to stipulate that price controls shall not apply to the first sale of crude oil produced from domestic wells whose daily production of crude oil for the preceding year did not exceed ten barrels per well.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the first sale of crude oil produced from stripper wells be exempt from price controls.
